p: Ciprofloxacin, amoxicillin, penicillin, and tetracycline were used as positive controls at concentrations of 0.1 mg/ml and 0.2 mg/ml, with equal amounts as those of the extracts (50 μl), and sterile distilled water (50 μl) was used as a negative control. All plates were with three replicates. Sizes of colony diameter were measured after 24 hrs of growth at 37°C [ 17].
